segments.text: Hello , can I start you off with anything to drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , may I have some water , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , would you like any appetizers today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I get an order of barbeque wings ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem , can I get you anything else ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thank you , that'll be all for now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , let me know when you're ready to order your food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , what can I get you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I have the fettuccini Alfredo ?
segments.speaker: S2
